tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE crops (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_name VARCHAR(255),
  yield INT,
  harvest_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE crop_yields (
  yield_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  farmer_id INT,
  crop_type TEXT,
  yield_amount INT,
  yield_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (farmer_id) REFERENCES farmers(farmer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Yields (
 yield_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 crop_id INT,
 yield_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
 yield_date DATE NOT NULL,
 FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES Crops(crop_id)
);

CREATE TABLE HarvestPredictions (
 prediction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 crop_id INT,
 prediction_date DATE NOT NULL,
 predicted_yield DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
 FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES Crops(crop_id)
);

CREATE TABLE yields (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT,
    farmer_id INT,
    yield_amount DECIMAL,
    yield_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE harvests (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT,
    farmer_id INT,
    harvest_date DATE,
    harvested_amount DECIMAL
);
